hero.name: Lylian Challier
hero.description: MSc student at <1>CentraleSupelec</1>, specialized in mathematics, AI, machine learning and deep learning, applying for a 6 month experience starting March 2026 as a step toward a future industrial PhD.
hero.subdescription: This year I was selected for the <1>Digital Tech Year</1> selective track, an innovation program, and awarded the <2>MathTech Gap Year fellowship</2> (4 laureates, FMJH). This experience bridges real-world AI innovation with my PhD-oriented research goals.

about.title: Research & Innovation
about.description: Passionate about bridging theoretical mathematics with practical AI applications. My work spans from explainable AI in physics to agentic systems for real-world applications.

versailles.title: Agentic AI Visit Assistant
versailles.desc: Agentic AI assistant for tourist visits at the Palace of Versailles.

turbulence.title: Explainable AI for Turbulence
turbulence.desc: Discovery of wall laws in turbulent convection with SINDy and KAN.

vae.title: Variational Auto-Encoders
vae.desc: VAE implementation with interactive Streamlit application.

electric.title: Electric Demand Forecasting
electric.desc: Electric demand forecasting with Deep Learning for EDF.

energy.title: Energy Consumption Modeling
energy.desc: Predictive modeling of energy consumption with R.

movies.title: Movie Recommendations
movies.desc: Movie recommendation system with unsupervised learning.

dty.title: Digital Tech Year
dty.desc: Innovation program, MathTech Gap Year fellowship (FMJH)

versailles.title: AI Research Intern
versailles.desc: Agentic AI visit assistant with LangChain

cta.title: Let's work together
cta.description: Looking for a 6-month experience starting March 2026. Open to research internships and industrial PhD opportunities.
